text: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?

text: I'd rather take coffee than compliments just now.
author: Louisa May Alcott

text: Coffee is a way of stealing time that should by rights belong to your older self.
author: Terry Pratchett

text: Even bad coffee is better than no coffee at all.
author: David Lynch

text: I don't really like coffee, she said, but I don't really like it when my head hits my desk when I fall asleep either.

text: Adventure in life is good; consistency in coffee even better.

text: Police work wouldn't be possible without coffee," Wallander said.

text: Come on, don't you ever stop and smell the coffee?

author: Leanna Renee Hieber

text: Mercy," he mumbled. "What the hell did you do to my French Roast?
author: Patricia Briggs

text: Only an idiot would rely on the energy of a bean or a leaf to stay awake throughout the day.

text: A morning coffee is my favorite way of starting the day, settling the nerves so that they don't later fray.

text: What the hell makes you smart?" I asked.

text: No matter what historians claimed, BC really stood for "Before Coffee.

text: It doesn't matter where you're from - or how you feel... There's always peace in a strong cup of coffee.

text: This is like a cookie, it tastes like a cookie having sex with a doughnut.
author: Daniel Handler

author: Cassandra Clare

text: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.

text: The fresh smell of coffee soon wafted through the apartment, the smell that separates night from day.

text: He mulled that over. "Sheriff Connally woulda let us shoot 'em."

text: Looks like I missed a party. Good. I wasn’t really in the mood to off demons this evening. Haven’t had my coffee yet. (Jared)

author: Sir James Mackintosh

text: Never say no to coffee

text: I need COFFEE to help me change the things I can... and WINE to help me accept the things I can't!

text: I don't just sip my coffee.

text: Sometimes success is simply being able to drink an entire cup of coffee while it's still hot.

text: It's when the coffee keeps coming, that I keep drinking.

text: Coffee became one of life's necessities when love was invented.

author: Anthony T.Hincks

author: Anthony T. Hincks

text: Iced coffee might be cold, but it was made in heaven.

text: He had to find her.
author: Jennifer Egan

text: Coffee is liquid cigarette.

text: I signed over my entire business for the sum of ten pounds and a gorilla-shaped hat. It would have been twenty pounds but I really wanted that hat.

text: Her coffee is getting cold as she waits for him to miss her, while his cigarettes are running one after another, trying to forget her.

text: if he was
author: Amanda Lovelace

text: Even a teapot craves a Starbucks café latte.

text: Coffee and books are a simple recipe for happiness.

author: Vijaya Gowrisankar
